semantics.label: Headline
semantics.description: If set, will be used for the headline of the exercise instead of the content title.

semantics.label: 안내
semantics.description: 학생들이 이 안내사항을 노트 위에 볼 것입니다.

fields.label: 노트 영역 자리
fields.default: 일자, 세부사항, 정의, 공식, 예시 등 입력

fields.label: Notes cannot be saved
fields.default: The platform either does not support the save content state feature or it is not activated in the platform's settings or you are not logged in. Your notes cannot be saved!

fields.label: Notes could not be copied to clipboard
fields.default: Notes could not be copied to clipboard

fields.label: 토글(Toggle) 버튼 제목(노트가 닫혀 있을 때)
토글(Toggle) 버튼 제목(노트가 열려 있을 때)
Notes saved
fields.default: The notes were saved to the platform.

fields.label: Hide notes
fields.description: @label is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective label of the notes field.

fields.label: Show notes
fields.description: @label is a placeholder and will be replaced with the respective label of the notes field.
